data.eml:eml: A needle in a haystack: the new genus Bernadottea (Diptera: Cecidomyiidae, Winnertziinae) with four new species in the Old World

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jaschhof, Mathias, Jaschhof, Catrin (2018): A needle in a haystack: the new genus Bernadottea (Diptera: Cecidomyiidae, Winnertziinae) with four new species in the Old World. Zootaxa 4379 (4): 529-538, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4379.4.5
